sentences.en: Assign the letters of the alphabet their numerical values — A equals 1, B equals 2, etc.
sentences.cn: 给字母表里的每个字母赋予相应的数值——A等于1，B等于2，等等。

sentences.en: It is due to numerical inaccuracy in the transient - temperature determination.
sentences.cn: 这是由于确定瞬时温度的数值不准确.

sentences.en: Make sure the files are organized in numerical order.
sentences.cn: 务必把这些档案按数字顺序排列。

sentences.en: Numerical examples are mostly taken from studies of the Saturn V vehicle.
sentences.cn: 数值例子大多数取自“土星V”飞行器的研究.

sentences.en: Such simplified radiation calculations are required for incorporation into numerical models.
sentences.cn: 为了编入数值模式,这个简化的辐射计算是很需要的.

sentences.en: The common system is used in numerical work almost exclusively.
sentences.cn: 在数值计算中,几乎只使用常用对数.

sentences.en: The home team tried to utilize their numerical advantage (= the fact that they had more players than the other team ).
sentences.cn: 主队试图利用他们在人数上的优势。

sentences.en: The invading force, conscious of their numerical inferiority at sea, decided on an airborne attack.
sentences.cn: 侵略军考虑到自己的海上兵力处于劣势, 决定采取空降袭击.

sentences.en: The method is generally less precise than refined methods of numerical analysis.
sentences.cn: 这种方法不如精细的数值分析法来的精确.

sentences.en: The numbers are in numerical order.
sentences.cn: 这些号码是按数字顺序排列的.

sentences.en: The numerical procedure has been derived in dimensionless form.
sentences.cn: 数值程序是按无因次形式推导的.

sentences.en: The numerical values available in Newton's time were not highly precise.
sentences.cn: 在牛顿的时代,可利用的数据都不是很精确的.

sentences.en: The results are expressed in descending numerical order .
Their numerical system, derived from the Babylonians, was based on multiples of the number six.
sentences.cn: 他们的数制源自古巴比伦人，以数字6的倍数为基数。

sentences.en: This consolidation meant having to reduce the numerical strength of the Army.
sentences.cn: 这次合并意味着不得不削减陆军的兵力。

sentences.en: Your job is to group them by letter and put them in numerical order.
sentences.cn: 你的工作是把他们按字母顺序分组，然后按数字顺序排序。

words.tran_cn: 计算；数字的读法；[数] 命数法；编号
[数]数值的；数字的；用数字表示的（等于numeric）

phrases.tran_cn: 微分计算，数值微分；数值微分法
n. 数值模式，数值模型
数值解；数值解释；近似解

trans.tran_cn: 数字的，用数字表示的，数值的
